message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and potential impact, I propose a price of $10000 for it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, and I'm willing to negotiate further. Considering the value of the product and your interest in it, I propose a price of $9800 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am still looking for the best deal possible. I am willing to pay $9600 for the product.
I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After considering our costs and the value we place on this opportunity, I propose a price of $9700 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am still interested in purchasing the product. I am willing to pay $9650 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the high value you place on the product, I am willing to accept a price of $9675 for it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I am still interested in purchasing the product. I am willing to pay $9625 for the product.
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $9650 for the product.
